name: Longsword
text: You gain 'Major Action: Deal 5 damage to an adjacent target'

name: Shield
text: Block Actions you take instead prevent all physical damage.

name: Plate Armor
text: Reduce all physical damage you take by 2.

name: Leather Vest
text: Reduce all physical damage you take by 1.

name: Dagger
text: You gain 'Minor Action: Deal 3 damage to an adjacent target'

name: Sling
text: You gain 'Major Action: Deal 2 damage to a target'

name: Staff
text: You gain 'Major Action: Deal 3 fire damage to a target'

name: Mace
text: You gain 'Major Action: deal 3 piercing damage to an adjacent target'

name: Holy Symbol
text: You gain 'Minor Action: Heal target ally for 1'

name: Fists of Steel
text: Your unarmed attacks deal 1 extra physical damage and may be used as Minor actions.

name: Boots of Speed
text: You may move as a free action once per turn.
